articles.author: ESPNcricinfo staff
articles.title: Gary Ballance retires from all cricket after brief Zimbabwe comeback - ESPNcricinfo
articles.description: Former England and Yorkshire batter leaves the game after successful return to native country
articles.content: Gary Ballance became only the second player to score a Test century for two different countries  •  Associated Press

articles.author: Gloria Oladipo
articles.title: Current avian flu strain deadlier than in past and could become endemic, study says - The Guardian
articles.description: Scientists raise alarm over avian influenza strain’s unprecedented deadliness and reach from farmed poultry and wild birds
articles.content: The current strain of the avian influenza, which has been decimating bird populations globally, is perilously different than previous disease outbreaks, according to US researchers who are calling fo… [+4219 chars]

articles.content: We're still waiting on preloads to go live on Xbox for the highly anticipated release of Star Wars Jedi: Survivor later this month, but an early screenshot appears to show that we'll need around 140G… [+1329 chars]

articles.author: Fiona Jackson
articles.title: Lyrid meteor shower set to dazzle stargazers on Saturday with up to 18 meteors an hour - Daily Mail
articles.description: The Lyrid shower takes its name from the constellation of Lyra, where the shooting stars appear to originate from. It will peak at 2:06 BST on Sunday April 23.
articles.content:
Stargazers are in for a treat this weekend, as the Lyrid meteor shower is returning for its annual dance across the night skies.
